name: Dark IRCCloud
description: A dark theme for the chat/log area of IRCCloud. There is a Bigger Screenshot if you are curious. For the source code go to darkcloud IRCCloud dark theme on github.
additional_info:
v1.0.5 - your messages background color a little darker
v1.0.4 - new messages division markers now have black background
v1.0.3 - removed the purple on hover of channel join and made that kind of messages less visible
v1.0.2 - Darker viewport and LastSeen message.
v1.0.1 - Larger fonts and better spaced. New messages since you tabbed out message now gray as well.
v1.0.0 - My first attempt at making things dark, some row types might still be missing. Hope you like it, feedback is appreciated.
